title: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen) - Factory Reset
summary: Resetting the device while keeping smart home connections.
content:
To Reset (Keep Connections): Press and hold 'Action' button (Dot icon) for 25 seconds. 

Factory Reset (Erase All): Press and hold 'Microphone Off' and 'Volume Down' buttons together for 20 seconds. Wait for the light ring to turn orange.
